name: Fleshed Out
storyline: After the death of Tchernobog, the surviving members of the Cabal opened up alternate spirit worlds to grow their army again. They are planning to create a new God and rule the world once and for all. So get the guns ready, Caleb is about make a bloody mess again...
summary: Fleshed Out is an episode add-on for Blood by SkobbeJakGames, a two man indie studio from Johannesburg, South Africa, released in bits and drabs since October 27, 2019.
